name: Facebook - Minimal [by daylo]
description:
** Facebook add new adverts all the time. I recommend using this theme in conjunction with an adblocker. **
Beautiful, simplified design. No adverts, and wider viewing of your posts. Also, a pretty login design, with your choice of login background!
Please give contructive critism on how to improve this design (ie bugs)! Thanks!


No futher support - released under CC0 - see profile

user.name: daylo
user.about: all styles have now been released under CC0 with no futher support. seems like nobody else gave a shit. if you want support check out the dirty code for yourself. bye~

additional_info:
Version 2.1.0
Twitter emojis and some material design icon replacements! More coming soon (hopefully this week). Search bar needs to be fixed in Eng US version. Version 2.0.6
Completely rewritten. I've noticed some bugs however those should be patched soon. Please give feedback <3 Version 1.2
I've finally got around to adding multiple choices for the login background. They're really pretty UNSPLASH photos. I've also fixed a bug where some textboxes' values (like search) were not visible. Alongside this, I've increased the width, and I've also fixed some other small things. Enjoy and if you like it, rate or donate!
